name: Synergy [GMTK Jam 2021]
description:
Push monsters into chargers to generate energy.
Push monsters into each other to generate synergy.

This was my first game jam and finished game for that matter.
I've studied design for a long time but not done anything complete, so that's nice.
I will still make more levels up to when the time runs out, so check it out when the JAM finishes.

It's not as polished as I could make it if I had, like, more than 48 hours, but there we go. 

[ ARROWS ] to move around and dance like a pro.
[ SPACE  or L1 or L2 or that weird mobile circle ] to grab and pull mons.
[ R, SELECT, START ] to retry
